commands.name: add place
commands.description: Add a restaurant to your favorites list.

commands.name: remove
commands.description: Removes the restaurant from your favorites list.

commands.name: ban
commands.description: Add a restaurant to your banned list.

commands.name: remove ban
commands.description: Removes a restaurant from your banned list.

commands.name: what's on my list
commands.description: Displays your favorited and banned lists.
